neighbors.name: Steven Torres
neighbors.claims: Steven Torres is listed as the owner of the property, potentially residing in Buckeye, AZ, where a Steven Torres is associated with residential records ([nationalpublicdata.com](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/t/braulio-torres/)). The draft's previous claim regarding a connection to 'MenStoppingViolence' was removed as it appears to reference a different individual or entity not matching the local context. No record of him serving in local public office or speaking out in community meetings on development issues could be located in available public sources.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident; no confirmed civic roles found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Steven Torres through personal outreach by a project representative. Verify his primary residence address as records are conflicting (Surprise vs. Buckeye). Build trust by emphasizing transparency and respect for property rights.

neighbors.profile_summary: Private landowner with no verified digital footprint regarding development stance.

citations.claim: Steven Torres associated with residential records in Buckeye, AZ
citations.title: Public Data Record - Torres Family

neighbors.name: Cecil Moreno & Veronica Rodriguez
neighbors.claims: Veronica Rodriguez Moreno, co-owner of the parcel, passed away on February 2, 2022, and was survived by her husband, Cecil Moreno Sr. ([dignitymemorial.com](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/tolleson-az/veronica-moreno-10578608)). Cecil Moreno has been identified as a beneficiary residing at the W Yanez Ave property ([yourveoliabenefits.com](https://yourveoliabenefits.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cc_xuitfmrddjd6e5kcatz9_12410827_12733759.pdf)). The property is located near the Parkplace at Buckeye development notification zone ([buckeyeaz.gov](https://d3n9y02raazwpg.cloudfront.net/buckeyeaz/b652ef45-11a4-11ec-9f1e-0050569183fa-d5033dd7-ac20-4286-a50e-adc27e05b567-1634864338.pdf)). Cecil Moreno has not been identified in public leadership positions or news reports related to local development, suggesting a private profile.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident; widower; no public leadership found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach Cecil Moreno with empathy, acknowledging the family's relatively recent loss. Use a community liaison if possible. Focus on respectful communication and property enjoyment.

neighbors.profile_summary: Widower and private landowner; likely focused on family and privacy.

neighbors.name: Joseph Stephenson
neighbors.claims: Joseph Stephenson is confirmed as the owner of the property at 9109 S 253rd Ave (APN 40035396) ([homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/9109-s-253rd-ave-buckeye-az/bgsxwby36fenb/)). A Joseph Stephenson is listed as a donor to Great Hearts Academies in Arizona, indicating potential support for local education initiatives ([greatheartsamerica.org](https://www.greatheartsamerica.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Great-Hearts-2016-2017-Annual-Report_download.pdf)), though a definitive link to this specific landowner is unverified. Searches yielded no references to Stephenson taking part in community meetings or activism on development issues.

approach_recommendations.engage: Conduct one-on-one outreach. If he is the Great Hearts donor, he may value community structure and educational benefits. Highlight how the project supports local tax revenue which benefits schools.

neighbors.profile_summary: Private landowner in Parkplace at Buckeye; possible ties to charter school philanthropy.
